description: Their confinement will soon be eased, as the latest death toll from coronavirus shows a dip.
title: Coronavirus: Spanish PM promises to ease confinement of children
title_page: Coronavirus: Spanish PM promises to ease confinement of children - BBC News
maintext: There has been growing social and political pressure on Prime Minister S¨¢nchez to allow children, in particular, to go outside. Opposition leader Pablo Casado tweeted that "these little heroes are climbing the walls" after more than a month of not being allowed out beyond the confines of their homes.
